mapper.select: select b.name as channelName,c.trade_value as tradeTypeName,a.percent,a.pay_channel_id from agent_profit_settings a left join pay_channels b on a.pay_channel_id=b.id left join dictionary_trade_types c on a.trade_type_id=c.id where a.agent_id=#{sonAgentsId} group by a.trade_type_id,a.pay_channel_id order by c.id,a.updated_at desc

select if(d.allQty is null,'0',d.allQty) as allQtyStr, case d.status when 1 then '待审核' when 2 then '初审不通过' when 3 then '初审通过' when 4 then '审核不通过' when 5 then '正常' when 6 then '已停用' else ' ' end as statusStr, case d.is_have_profit when 0 then '关闭' else if(d.default_profit is null,'非默认比例','默认比例') end as isProfitStr, d.* from(select a.id,a.company_name,a.status,a.is_have_profit,a.default_profit, (select sum(b.quantity) from prepare_goods_records b where b.agent_id=a.id) as allQty, (select count(c.id) from terminals c where c.agent_id=a.id and c.customer_id!=null and c.status=1) as openNum, (select count(c.id) from terminals c where c.agent_id=a.id and c.customer_id!=null) as soldNum, date_format(a.created_at,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as created_at,a.types from agents a where a.parent_id=#{agentsId} order by a.updated_at desc) d Limit #{offset},#{rows}
select count(a.id) from customers a where a.username like #{loginId}
select count(a.id) from agents a where a.parent_id=#{agentsId}
select a.id from customers a where a.username like #{loginId}

select c.*,c.name as cityName,if(e.name is null," ",e.name) as provinceName from (select a.types,a.name,a.card_id,a.company_name,a.business_license,a.phone,a.email,a.address,a.is_have_profit, b.username as loginId,b.city_id as cityId,if(a.tax_registered_no is null, " ",a.tax_registered_no) as tax_registered_no,a.created_at, (select if(sum(f.quantity) is null,0,sum(f.quantity)) from prepare_goods_records f where f.agent_id=a.id) as allQty, (select count(g.id) from terminals g where g.agent_id=a.id and g.customer_id!=null and g.status=1) as openNum, (select count(h.id) from terminals h where h.agent_id=a.id and h.customer_id!=null) as soldNum from agents a left join customers b on b.id=a.customer_id where a.id=#{sonAgentsId}) c left join cities d on c.cityId=d.id left join cities e on d.id=e.parent_id;
select a.name,a.id from cities a where a.parent_id=0
select a.name,a.id from cities a where a.parent_id=#{proId}

select b.trade_value,b.id,c.name,c.id from support_trade_types a left join dictionary_trade_types b on a.trade_type_id=b.id left join pay_channels c on a.pay_channel_id=c.id where a.pay_channel_id=#{id} order by b.id
mapper.insert: insert into agents(types,name,card_id,company_name,business_license,phone,email,address, is_have_profit,created_at,updated_at,code,customer_id,status,parent_id, default_profit,card_id_photo_path,license_no_pic_path,tax_no_pic_path,tax_registered_no) values(#{agentType},#{agentName},#{agentCardId},#{companyName},#{companyId},#{phoneNum}, #{emailStr},#{addressStr},#{isProfit},now(),now(),#{agentsId},#{customerId},1,#{agentsId}, (select a.default_profit from agents a where a.id=#{agentsId}),#{cardPhotoPath}, #{licensePhotoPath},#{taxPhotoPath},#{taxNumStr})
mapper.update: update agent_profit_settings set percent=#{precent},created_at=now(),updated_at=now() where agent_id=#{sonAgentsId} and pay_channel_id=#{payChannelId} and trade_type_id=#{tradeTypeId}

update agents a set a.types=#{agentType},a.company_name=#{companyName}, a.business_license=#{companyId},a.name=#{agentName},a.card_id=#{agentCardId}, a.phone=#{phoneNum},a.email=#{emailStr},a.address=#{addressStr} ,is_have_profit=#{isProfit}, a.updated_at=now(),code=#{agentsId} where a.id=#{sonAgentsId}
update customers a set a.password=#{pwd} where a.username =#{loginId}
update agents a set a.status =#{status} ,a.updated_at =now() where a.id=#{sonAgentsId}
update customers a set a.password =#{pwd} ,a.updated_at=now() where a.id=(select b.customer_id from agents b where b.id=#{sonAgentsId})
update agents a set a.default_profit=#{defaultProfit} ,a.updated_at=now() where a.parent_id=#{agentsId} or a.id=#{agentsId}
mapper.select: select count(a.id) from agent_profit_settings a where a.agent_id=#{sonAgentsId} and a.pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId}
